Membership Application Form

Mail Membership application and cheque to:

Western Canadian Blacksmiths' Guild
6208 45 Ave
Camrose, Alberta
T4V 0C2

or bring your application to one of the meetings.
Membership Application to the
Western Canadian Blacksmiths' Guild, Founding Chapter (Edmonton region)
The membership fee is $50.00, and includes fees to cover the cost of coal and other shop supplies. Membership runs from January 1 to December 31.

Open the following PDF document, print it and fill out the details.

To view or print the above .PDF file you may need to download the Adobe Acrobat Reader.
